comment: Pick up contribution renewals with 1961 Jan-Jun
additional-notes: Active contribution renewals are recorded beginning in the 1958 January-June CCE volume, but the earliest actively renewed contribution is noted in the 1959 January-June volume.

The Daily issues are numbered separately from the Sunday issues (though both use the same volume numbers).  The first Sunday Tribune issue with an active renewal is the July 21, 1946 issue, volume 105, number 29.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Joe Kishman for copyright research on this title.
